page.title: Patriots Buckle Down Before Weis Moves (AP)
page.text: AP - Bill Belichick took a few minutes Monday to convey his congratulations to his offensive coordinator on becoming Notre Dame's head coach. Now it's time for Charlie Weis to get back to work for the New England Patriots. Weis will finish the NFL season #151; at least six more games if the Patriots reach the Super Bowl #151; and Belichick doesn't expect his impending move will be a distraction.
